summary: This bill, the 'Opioid Overdose Data Collection Enhancement Act,' aims to improve the collection and analysis of data related to opioid overdoses. It amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act to expand the Comprehensive Opioid Abuse Grant Program. The bill focuses on developing and implementing interoperable, web-based tools to track fatal and nonfatal overdoses, and the administration of reversal medications. It specifies requirements for participating entities, including data sharing and coordination with public safety and health responses.
